verses.roman:
saptama-paricchede--vallabha bhaṭṭera milana
nānā-mate kailā tāṅra garva khaṇḍana

synonyms: saptama-paricchede—in the Seventh Chapter; vallabha bhaṭṭera milana—the meeting of Vallabha Bhaṭṭa with Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nānā-mate—in various ways; kailā—did; tāṅra—his; garva—pride; khaṇḍana—dismantling.
translation: The Seventh Chapter tells how Śrī Caitanya met Vallabha Bhaṭṭa and dismantled his false pride in various ways.
